## ErrorType enum

Identifier for the type of error causing the failure.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum ErrorType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  BackendError | <code>&quot;BACKEND_ERROR&quot;</code> | internal error from api backend |
|  InvalidConfig | <code>&quot;INVALID_CONFIG&quot;</code> | invalid config from request |
|  InvalidQuery | <code>&quot;INVALID_QUERY&quot;</code> | invalid query from request |
|  Timeout | <code>&quot;TIMEOUT&quot;</code> | timeout error from server |
